short_description: Key Features 3/4" cutting capacity, Constructed of Carbonite, Hardened steel blades, Soft comfort grips  Benifits With most garden tools you spend more time sharpening and cleaning rust off them than you spend gardening. Carbonite is a new blade coating that solves that problem. It's 50% stronger and has 20% less friction than titanium nitride coatings and is 100% guaranteed to make you love gardening more than ever. This innovative technology resists corrosion and keep blades sharp longer, so you can shear, lop, prune and saw without worrying about your tools. Carbonite is just another way the Garden IQ series is putting the joy back into gardening.

summary: Hex head Tapper anchors are measured from below the washer while flat head Tapper anchors are measured end to end. To select the proper minimum anchor length, determine the embedment depth required to obtain the desired load capacity. Then add the thickness of the fixture, including any spacers or shims, to the embedment depth.

summary: The Smart DI+ is an all-steel, machine bolt anchor available in carbon steel. It can be used in solid concrete, hard stone, and solid block base materials. The Smart DI+ is specifically designed to be easier to fully set during installation as a benefit to the user.
Manual setting tool for Smart DI+ Anchor (Drop in)

The Steel Dropin is an all-steel, machine bolt anchor available in carbon steel and two types of stainless steel. It can be used in solid concrete, hard stone, and solid block. A coil-thread version for forming applications is also available.

summary: The Power-Stud® anchor is a one piece fully threaded, wedge style anchor available in carbon steel and stainless steel. Threaded, Rod Hanger and Tie-Wire versions are designed for use in solid concrete. The drill bit diameter needed for proper installation is the same as the anchor diameter.

The Domestic Wedge Anchor is a threaded, torque-controlled, carbon steel or stainless steel wedge expansion anchor which is designed for consistent performance in concrete. Suitable base materials are normal-weight and sand-lightweight concrete. The anchor is manufactured with carbon steel body and expansion clip or a stainless steel body and expansion clip. Nut and washer are included.
